title: Ghats, Ganga & Wildlife
highlights: Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal in Jaipur
Taj Mahal at sunset and Agra Fort
Varanasi sunrise boat + Ganga Aarti + Sarnath

days.title: Arrive New Delhi
days.summary: Arrival, meet and assist, check-in, trip documents, overnight in Delhi.

days.title: Explore Old & New Delhi
days.summary: Red Fort (outside), Jama Masjid, Raj Ghat, Chandni Chowk walk; Qutab Minar, India Gate, drive past President’s House & Parliament.

days.title: Drive Delhi → Jaipur (260 km / 5–6 hrs)
days.summary: Leisurely drive to the Pink City. Evening at leisure. Overnight in Jaipur.

days.title: Jaipur: Forts, Palaces and Observatory
days.summary: Morning Amber Fort (Temple of Kali, Hall of Victory). Afternoon Jantar Mantar, City Palace, Hawa Mahal. Evening stroll and shopping.

days.title: Jaipur → Ranthambhore
days.summary: Drive through countryside. Visit Ranthambhore Fort; lakes, temples, sweeping views. Dinner and overnight at jungle lodge.

days.title: Ranthambhore: Morning & Evening Safaris
days.summary: Open-jeep game drives in Ranthambhore Tiger Reserve; resort downtime; all meals.

days.title: Ranthambhore: More Safaris
days.summary: Second day of morning/evening safaris; wildlife viewing in different zones.

days.title: Ranthambhore → Agra via Fatehpur Sikri
days.summary: Stop at Fatehpur Sikri; visit Agra Fort; sunset at the Taj Mahal. Overnight in Agra. Note: Taj Mahal closed on Fridays.

days.title: Agra → Jhansi (train) → Orchha → Khajuraho
days.summary: Executive Chair Car to Jhansi; explore riverside Orchha’s palaces/temples; drive to Khajuraho; Sound & Light show in evening.

days.title: Khajuraho → Varanasi (flight)
days.summary: Morning: Eastern & Southern Temples. Afternoon flight to Varanasi. Evening Ganga Aarti on the ghats.

days.title: Varanasi: Sunrise Boat, Kashi Vishwanath & Sarnath
days.summary: Sunrise boat on Ganges; visit Vishwanath Temple; excursion to Sarnath; optional massage/relaxation time.

days.title: Depart India
days.summary: Fly to Delhi for onward connection. Goodbye for now.

seo.meta_title: Ghats, Ganga & Wildlife — 12 Days | Jetset Travel
seo.meta_description: Old & New Delhi, Jaipur, Ranthambhore safaris, Agra & Taj, Orchha, Khajuraho and Varanasi boat ride with Ganga Aarti.
